description: A 3-bedroom house with 2 bathrooms and a spacious garden. Located in a family-friendly neighborhood, it comes with a two-car garage and a renovated kitchen. The price is 568,000 dollars.
A 4-bedroom apartment in the heart of the city. Includes 3 bathrooms, a modern kitchen, and a balcony with a great view. Building amenities include a gym and pool. The price is 320,000 dollars.

A 2-bedroom condo with an open floor plan and hardwood floors. Located near public transportation and shopping centers. It features a rooftop terrace and covered parking. The price is 210,000 dollars.

A 5-bedroom mansion with 5 full bathrooms and 2 half-baths. The property includes a large swimming pool, tennis court, wine cellar, and home theater. Gated and located in an exclusive area. The price is 1,200,000 dollars.

A 3-bedroom townhouse with a modern design and eco-friendly features. Includes solar panels and a rainwater harvesting system. The complex offers communal gardens and playgrounds. The price is 420,000 dollars.
